Russia has no plans to deploy nuclear arms beyond Belarus, says deputy ministerRussia will not deploy nuclear weapons abroad except in its ally Belarus but will find ways to counter any deployment of U.S. tactical nuclear weapons in Britain, the deputy minister in charge of arms control said on Thursday. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 16:01:34 GMT C7O2GLZFYZN6FBBA66WELYNREU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-has-no-plans-deploy-nuclear-arms-beyond-belarus-says-deputy-minister-2024-02-01/Dmitry Antonov, Guy Faulconbridge世界欧洲
Italy's Meloni urges swift trial for Italian activist held in HungaryThe Italian anti-fascist activist held in Hungary for assaulting far-right militants should be granted a quick trial, Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni said on Thursday, wading into a controversy that is souring relations between Rome and Budapest. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 15:59:07 GMT B5RMRFBDEJNWNI2VUY22XCNMDU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/italys-meloni-urges-swift-trial-italian-activist-held-hungary-2024-02-01/Reuters世界欧洲
United Nations seeks $2.7 billion for aid to Yemen in 2024The United Nations appealed for $2.7 billion on Thursday to pay for humanitarian aid operations this year in war-torn Yemen, where most of the 18 million people in need live in the north of the country ruled by the Iran-aligned Houthi group. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 15:31:26 GMT SCF2HOAO3FLLNLSJ3QPSG6WGYQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/united-nations-seeks-27-billion-aid-yemen-2024-2024-02-01/Reuters世界中东
Why are farmers protesting in France and other parts of Europe?Farmers' protests have mounted across the European Union to press leaders to do more to help them with taxes and rising costs, among other grievances including over cheap imports and bureaucracy. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 15:27:21 GMT EBJBEO23SFKAJK7PRFPN6QLNZQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/why-farmers-are-protesting-europe-2024-02-01/Sybille Hamaide, Gus Trompiz商业工作世界
Unknown fate of Palestinian girl, ambulance team highlights Gaza rescue challengesA terrified Palestinian girl trapped in a car in Gaza with her dead family begged rescuers to save her after Israeli forces opened fire. But days after the Red Crescent dispatched an ambulance to the area there is no news of her fate. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 15:26:06 GMT QBSUAQVGI5JFZL7J264NBMRZFE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/unknown-fate-palestinian-girl-ambulance-team-highlights-gaza-rescue-challenges-2024-02-01/Ali Sawafta, Henriette Chacar世界中东

Biden to issue order targeting Jewish settler violence in W.BankU.S. President Joe Biden is expected to issue an executive order on Thursday targeting Jewish settlers who attack Palestinians in the occupied West Bank, a source familiar with the matter said. Clashes erupt at Greek protest against education reformGreek police briefly clashed with masked protesters waving red flags on wooden poles outside parliament on Thursday during demonstrations against plans to let foreign private universities operate in the country. Ailing Myanmar ex-leader Suu Kyi in 'good spirits' in solitary, says son - mediaMyanmar's detained former leader and democracy icon Aung San Suu Kyi is in good spirits in solitary confinement "even if her health is not as good as it was in the past", her son was quoted on Thursday as saying. Exclusive: U.S. believes drone that killed soldiers was Iranian-made - sourcesThe United States has assessed that Iran manufactured the drone that slammed into a U.S. base in Jordan over the weekend, killing three U.S. soldiers and wounding more than 40, four U.S. officials told Reuters.
